string-array.name: sightsDescriptions
string-array.item: One of the largest and most beautiful castle ruins in the country.
The second oldest church by the time it was built is St. Peter and Paul.
Kleb is a lively park in the middle of downtown Nagold.

string-array.name: sightsFullDescription
string-array.item: The medieval Hohennagold castle ruins are prominent and clearly visible from afar above the city of Nagold. You can climb the Schlossberg via various hiking trails through the nature reserve.
The church as it exists today is a three-aisled basilica. It was partly built on the old foundation walls in the 11th century after the old St. Peters Church was demolished.
The city park Kleb is more than just a park directly on the old town of Nagold.
